verses.roman:
udyāne vasilā prabhu bhakta-gaṇa lañā
tabe vāṇīnātha āilā mahā-prasāda lañā

synonyms: udyāne—in the garden; vasilā—sat down; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhakta-gaṇa lañā—with the devotees; tabe—at that time; vāṇīnātha—Vāṇīnātha Rāya; āilā—came; mahā-prasāda lañā—bringing all kinds of mahā-prasāda.
translation: In the garden, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu sat down with the other devotees. Vāṇīnātha Rāya then came and brought all kinds of mahā-prasāda.
